body:
Features and Enhancements

Cost Impact
  • Implementing the initial functionality. Cost Impact is not production ready at this time.
  • Questions about Cost Impact? Use the orange Contact us link on the right side of the page.

Issues Fixed

  • Fixed an issue in Create a List with Dropped provider count when using radius search
  • Fixed an issue in Create a List with drop counts when filtering on specialties
  • Fixed an issue in Compare Networks causing the map of dropped providers to take a long time to load
  • Fixed an issue in Rank Networks where the user had configured a list of excluded network_alias_ids that are no longer present in the project data
  • Fixed an issue in Competitive Access where the Recruiting list query was timing out
  • Fixed an issue in Competitive Access where the Recruiting list export was timing out

Technical Upgrades

  • Upgrade react-query to v1.5.6
